channel.title: Crown won't appear?

item.title: Crown won't appear?
item.dc:creator: @blo0d_pker blo0d pker
item.description:
@blo0d_pker wrote:

my regular crowns(Admin, Mod), work fine. But I went in and tried to add in a new one. I’m not sure what i’m missing though… Here’s what I have so far.

case 5: modIcons[4].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break;

case 5: modIcons[4].drawSprite(k1, yPos - 12); k1 += 14; break;

case 5: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[4].drawSprite(j2 - 18,yPos - 12); j2 += 15; break;

case 5: modIcons[4].drawSprite(xPos, yPos - 12); xPos += 14; break;

case 5: modIcons[5].drawSprite(k1, yPos - 12); k1 += 14; break;

case 5: j2 += clanNameWidth; modIcons[4].drawSprite(j2 - 18, yPos - 12); j2 += 14; break;

if(byte1 == 5) { modIcons[4].drawSprite(k1, l - 12); k1 += 12; }
^ Are in the corresponding areas. Like, case 5, is underneath case 4, etc.
I was going by the case numbers that the playerRights had to = 5. What did I do wrong, or what am I missing?
And yes, the sprite is in the correct folder.

Read full topic
